ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( INCLUDES (HWS_SupportedQuoteTypes__c, "Unreturned Part") && isblank (HWS_Scope_of_work_Unreturned_Parts_id__c),
INCLUDES(HWS_SupportedQuoteTypes__c, "Damaged Part") && isblank (HWS_Scope_of_work_Damaged_Parts_id__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Supported Quote Types is Damaged , please fill Scope of work Damaged Parts If Supported Quote Types is Unreturned ,please fill Scope of work Unreturned Parts
